channel.title: jira.namics.com
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5681] If you change on result page on technical view and go to detail page --> 404 page appears
item.description:
If you change on result page on technical view and go to detail page --> 404 page appears.. see prt screen

Update, 06.11.2014: Cleared cache, searched for "ser", click on technical view, click on second product "506842" and issue appeared. Tried again 5min later and then it worked.
item.summary: If you change on result page on technical view and go to detail page --> 404 page appears

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4744] SEO - URL Migration Issues - Old categories redirected to new categories
item.description:
Old categories redirected to new categories :

Every old url must be redirected in HTTP 301 to the most relevant url of the new website (without 404 errors or 302 redirection).

n° state issue
1 nok Old categories must be redirected to new corresponding categories
  • This project can only be achieved with a database/feed containing information about url products categorization :
    product_url;lvl1_url;lvl2_url;lvl3_url;lvl4_url;lvl5_url;lvlX_url...
    For the old website and the new one (we can also use the data from distrelec.de if old distrelec.ch does not exist)
  • This data have to be provided by the PIM manager.
    https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-4679
  • They will be 5 redirection behavior case :
    • Exact match of an old category to a new category,
    • Merge of two+ old category into a unique new one,
    • Split of one unique old category into 2+ new onces,
    • Creation of new category without direct match into the old hierarchy tree,
    • Removal of an old category without direct match into the new hierarchy tree of the new website.

The matching model to use :

  • if (products of the old category does match at 75% or more the products of a new category of the same hierarchy level)
  • then (old category 301 redirect to the new category of the same hierarchy level with the biggest matching)
  • elseif (products of the old category match at less than 75% the product of any new category of the same hierarchy level)
  • then (
    • if (products of the old category does match at 75% or more the products of a new category of the same hierarchy level -1)
    • then (old category 301 redirect to the new category of the same hierarchy level -1 with the biggest matching )
    • elseif (products of the old category match at less than 75% the product of any new category of the same hierarchy level -1)
    • then (
      • if (products of the old category does match at 75% or more the products of the a new category of the same hierarchy level -2)
      • then (old category 301 redirect to the new category of the same hierarchy level -2 with the biggest matching )
      • elseif (products of the old category match at less than 75% the product of any new category of the same hierarchy level -2)
      • then (
        • and so on until the first hierarchy level...)
          If a matching provide an identical matching for 2 new category the choice must be done manually if it's less than 5% of the total ammount.
          If an old category does not match any higher new category level , 301 redirect to http://www.distrelec.ch

Exemples :

  • lvl5 - High Side Power Switches
    OLD =https://www.distrelec.ch/high-side-power-switches/power-fets/en & https://www.distrelec.de/ishopWebFront/search/luceneSearch.do?dispatch=show&fromCatalog=true&filterHierarchyNodeId=20088&filterHierarchyLevel=5&hierarchyDepth=0&autoAttributeEnabled=false
    NEW = http://www.distrelec.ch/en/Components/Active-Components/Discrete-Semiconductors-Tubes/Power-FETs/High-Side-Power-Switches/c/cat-20088
    (Exact match case)
  • lvl4 - Power FETs
    OLD = https://www.distrelec.ch/power-fets/discrete-semiconductors-tubes/en
    NEW = http://www.distrelec.ch/en/Components/Active-Components/Discrete-Semiconductors-Tubes/Power-FETs/c/cat-L3D_525233
    (Exact match case)
  • lvl3 - Discrete Semiconductors/Tubes
    OLD = https://www.distrelec.ch/active-components/en
    NEW = http://www.distrelec.ch/en/Components/Active-Components/c/cat-L2D_379524
    (Merge match case, the old lvl3 url is the same as old lvl2 in here, we take in consideration the highest one inside the url hierarchy, we redirect to the new lvl2)
  • lvl2 - Active Components
    OLD = https://www.distrelec.ch/active-components/en
    NEW = http://www.distrelec.ch/en/Components/Active-Components/c/cat-L2D_379524
    (Exact match case)
  • lvl1 - Electronics & Automation
    OLD = https://www.distrelec.ch/electronics-&-automation/en
    NEW = http://www.distrelec.ch/en/Components/c/cat-L1D_379509
    (Split match case, https://www.distrelec.ch/electronics-&-automation/en have been splitted into http://www.distrelec.ch/en/Components/c/cat-L1D_379509 & http://www.distrelec.ch/en/Automation/c/cat-L1D_379516, we have to redirect to the one with the most product in common)

Those rule will be implement inside a redirection router.

This router have to be built to be reusable in a second time for everyday redirection (evolution of the website respecting the 5 potential redirection cases)
item.summary: SEO - URL Migration Issues - Old categories redirected to new categories

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

Hi Pierre
here my notes:

category lvl 4:
https://www.distrelec.de/mydlink-netzwerk-kameras/d-link/dcs-930l-e/it-&-zubeh%C3%B6r
=301>
http://www.distrelec.de/manufacturer/mydlink-netzwerk-kameras/d-link/dcs-930l-e
200 but "Manufacturer not found"
Fix to do on manufacture htaccess rules

category lvl 4:
https://www.distrelec.de/mydlink-netzwerk-kameras/d-link/dcs-930l-e/it-&-zubeh%C3%B6r
=301>
http://www.distrelec.de/manufacturer/mydlink-netzwerk-kameras/d-link/dcs-930l-e
200 but "Manufacturer not found"
Fix to do on manufacture htaccess rules

This issue is because there are some strange redirects implemented since the begin of the project.
in particular these two rules should be removed from the httpd configuration:

RewriteRule ^/(.*)\/it-&-zubehör$ /manufacturer/$1 [R=302,L]
RewriteRule ^/(.*)\/hobby-&-freizeit$ /manufacturer/$1 [R=302,L]

cat lvl 2 :
https://www.distrelec.de/netzwerkprodukte
=301>
http://www.distrelec.de/

This issue is because there is this redirect rule in the current configuration:

RewriteRule ^/netzwerkprodukte$ / [R=301,L]

manufacturer :
http://www.distrelec.de/manufacturer/brother
=> 200 but "Manufacturer not found"
(supposed to be http://www.distrelec.de/manufacturer/brother/man_brt)

This issue is because is still missing the mapping list of:
old manufacturer code (brother) -> new manufacturer code (man_brt)

Ok, thx for the update.

note 1 :
On the seo point of view those deprecated rule can be removed

note 2 :
Is it a legacy rule or a new one we implemented ?
by default I would say it can be removed.

note 3 :
I have created a tiquet to gather this data, https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-5649

Hi Pierre
i'm really sorry but yesterday evening i forgot to restart the web servers.
Today i've done it and i also fixed a couple of wrong configurations.

Now in test system every point shoud be fixed.

Extensive testing until 12:00 to check any side effect.

After extensive testing, I confirm their is no side effect.

Those rules are ready to be deployed on production.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5685] CH-OCI wrong prices in OCI Interface
item.description:
Hello, the transfering of customers prices is not ok. The price the customer got's is the standard price not his price. It is Ok in the basket.

See pictures
customer:
https://www.distrelec.ch/ociEntry?username=siemens-ch-ger@oci.distrelec&password=sdhf563&oci_version=4.0&hook_url=https://www.elfa.se/elfa3/catalogdb/DisplayParametersServlet
item.summary: CH-OCI wrong prices in OCI Interface

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Please check this DISTRELEC-4652

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5665] DE // Payment issue with EVO
item.description:
We monitored the first transactions coming in on the german account.
What we noticed is that there are transaction declined because of a technical error. The data within the parameter <OrderDesc> exceed the restrictions. E.g. transaction:

<PayID>353015d8d8494fe0ae9caaa3e4df6bc9</PayID>
<MID>pg_55265</MID>
<RefNr>00250NRY141103040251</RefNr>

Data transmitted within <OrderDesc>:

15050745,Battery holder for 4 x Mignon/AA/LR6,6.92;16950038,Battery connection 1 x 9 V Cable,1.9;
17521480,LED 10 mm (T3Â½) red,0.14;
17372727,Logic IC Octal 3-State Driver DIL-20,1.03;11043710,DC/DC converter 5 W 3.3 VDC 0.5 A,6.65;
11043713,DC/DC converter 5 W 9 VDC 0.5 A,6.65;
17347115,Logic IC Dual D FF DIL-14,0.3;
17347180,Logic IC Decade Counter Divid. DIL-16,0.34;
17347222,Logic IC 14-Bit Binary Counter DIL-16,0.3;
17347479,Logic IC Quad 2-Input OR Gate DIL-14,0.28;
17347487,Logic IC Dual 4-Input OR Gate DIL-14,0.28;
17347537,Logic IC Quad 2-Input AND Gate DIL-14,0.29;
17369432,Logic IC Quad 2-In. NAND S.-T. DIL-14,0.3;
17347032,Logic IC Dual Prec. Monost. MV DIL-16,0.38;
17386208,Real Time Clock ICs SO-16,7.56;
17379795,Operational Amplifier Quad 1.2 MHz DIL-14,0.34;
17313331,Driver IC DIL-18,0.74;
16571384,Capacitor 1 nF 100 VDC 5.08 mm,0.19;
16573638,Capacitor 47 nF 50 VDC 5.08 mm,0.36;
16572689,Capacitor 100 nF 50 VDC 5.08 mm,0.16;

Decline:
<Code>21500000</Code><Status>Transaction refused</Status>
<Error>Value of OrderDescription element has been truncated.;Transaction refused because of an invalid argument. See additional error messages for details.;10433</Error>

Due to technical reference the following is allowed: alphanumeric; field lenght: 127

Can you please double-check?

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Nabil,
Please implement it as followed:

  • If we have 1 Item please add the Item number and short description
  • If we have more than one item add only the item numbers
  • Please shorten the whole data to 127 characters

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5662] New Customer Registration Email Template Wrong - Distrelec.de
item.description:
The text before the button is wrong. Please use the following text:

----------
Sehr geehrter Kunde,
Damit wir die Einrichtung Ihres Distrelec Kontos abschliessen können, bitten wir Sie um Autorisierung Ihrer E-Mail-Adresse. Bitte klicken Sie auf den folgenden Link:

<<button>>

Anschliessend ist Ihr Konto aktiv. Wir freuen uns auf Ihren Einkauf!
------------

And button must be double the horizontal size and centered.
item.summary: New Customer Registration Email Template Wrong - Distrelec.de

status.description: This issue was once resolved, but the resolution was deemed incorrect. From here issues are either marked assigned or resolved.

comments.comment:
Sorry, message was not correctly stated.

----------
Sehr geehrter Kunde,
Damit wir die Einrichtung Ihres Distrelec Kontos abschliessen können, bitten wir Sie um Autorisierung Ihrer E-Mail-Adresse. Bitte klicken Sie auf den folgenden Link:

<<button>>

Anschliessend ist Ihr Konto aktiv. Wir freuen uns auf Ihren Einkauf!
